org.jruyi.io

Interface ISession


  • public interface ISession
    A session represents a context of a connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object attach(Object attachment)
      Attaches the specified attachment to this session.
      Object attachment()
      Gets the current attachment.
      IBuffer createBuffer()
      Creates an empty buffer using the buffer factory associated with this session.
      Object deposit(Object id, Object something)
      Deposits the specified something to this session with the specified id as the reference-equality key.
      Object detach()
      Detaches the current attachment off the session.
      Object get(String name)
      Gets the value of the session attribute whose name is the specified name.
      Long id()
      Returns the session ID.
      Object inquiry(Object id)
      Returns the object deposited with the specified id as the reference-equality key.
      Object localAddress()
      Returns the address of the local peer.
      Object put(String name, Object value)
      Puts an attribute, which maps the specified name to the specified value, into this session.
      Object remoteAddress()
      Returns the address of the remote peer.
      Object remove(String name)
      Removes the attribute whose name is the specified name from this session.
      Object withdraw(Object id)
      Withdraws the object deposited with the specified id as the reference-equality key.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        Long id()
        Returns the session ID.
        Returns:
        the session ID

      • localAddress

        Object localAddress()
        Returns the address of the local peer.
        Returns:
        the local address

      • remoteAddress

        Object remoteAddress()
        Returns the address of the remote peer.
        Returns:
        the remote address

      • put

        Object put(String name,
         Object value)
        Puts an attribute, which maps the specified name to the specified value, into this session.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to be associated with the specified value
        value - the value to be associated with the specified name
        Returns:
        the previous value associated with the specified name, or null if there was no mapping for name

      • get

        Object get(String name)
        Gets the value of the session attribute whose name is the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute
        Returns:
        the value of the attribute, or null if no such attribute

      • remove

        Object remove(String name)
        Removes the attribute whose name is the specified name from this session.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute
        Returns:
        the value of the attribute, or null if no such attribute

      • deposit

        Object deposit(Object id,
             Object something)
        Deposits the specified something to this session with the specified id as the reference-equality key.
        Parameters:
        id - the reference-equality key
        something - the object to deposit
        Returns:
        the previous deposited object, or null if none

      • withdraw

        Object withdraw(Object id)
        Withdraws the object deposited with the specified id as the reference-equality key.
        Parameters:
        id - the reference-equality key
        Returns:
        the deposited object with the specified id as the reference-equality key, or null if no such deposit

      • inquiry

        Object inquiry(Object id)
        Returns the object deposited with the specified id as the reference-equality key.
        Parameters:
        id - the reference-equality key
        Returns:
        the deposited object

      • createBuffer

        IBuffer createBuffer()
        Creates an empty buffer using the buffer factory associated with this session.
        Returns:
        an empty buffer

      • attach

        Object attach(Object attachment)
        Attaches the specified attachment to this session.
        Parameters:
        attachment - the attachment
        Returns:
        the previous attachment, or null if there was no attachment

      • attachment

        Object attachment()
        Gets the current attachment.
        Returns:
        the current attachment

      • detach

        Object detach()
        Detaches the current attachment off the session.
        Returns:
        the attachment that is detached
